AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: MIMED Batch Add Commit Visit Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: MIMED Batch Add Commit Visit Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: UM Dev
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.FormHeader: Add commit MIMED batch Visits data

SaveImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_UMHSBATCHCOMMIT_VISITS ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output ,@BATCHID uniqueidentifier ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@VALIDATEONLY bit = 0 -- Batch fields ,@MRN nvarchar(50) = '' ,@PROVIDERDRNUMBER nvarchar(50) = '' ,@LASTPROCDATE datetime = null ,@VISITTYPE nvarchar(1) = 'O' ,@UMHSDATA_CSN bigint = 0 ,@UMHSDATA_PROV_ID bigint = 0 ,@VISITSTARTDATE datetime = null ,@VISITENDDATE datetime = null ,@PROVIDERROLE nvarchar(50) = '' ,@PATIENTHOSPITALROOM nvarchar(150) = '' ,@HOSPITALVISITDATE datetime = null ,@DEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@SUBDEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@CATEGORYMEMBERDESCRIPTION nvarchar(500) = '' ) as
set nocount on; declare @UMHSID uniqueidentifier; declare @PROVIDERID uniqueidentifier; declare @CURRENTDATE datetime
set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
select @UMHSID=ID from dbo.USR_UMHS_DATA where MRN=@MRN
if @UMHSID is NULL begin RAISERROR('Unknown Medical Record Number (MRN).', 13, 1); end
select @PROVIDERID=ID from USR_UMHS_PROVIDERS where PROVIDERDRNUMBER=@PROVIDERDRNUMBER
if @PROVIDERID is NULL begin RAISERROR('Unknown Provider doctor number.', 13, 1); end
/* * Commit sub-department if it is a sub-department of the department */ declare @MATCHEDSUBDEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier;
set @MATCHEDSUBDEPARTMENTID = dbo.USR_UFN_UMHSBATCH_GETMATCHEDSUBDEPARTMENTID(@DEPARTMENTID, @SUBDEPARTMENTID);
begin try begin tran -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_UMHS_VISITS (ID, UMHSID, PROVIDERID, DEPARTMENTID, SUBDEPARTMENTID, CATEGORYMEMBERDESCRIPTION, LASTPROCDATE, VISITTYPE, VISITSTARTDATE, VISITENDDATE, PROVIDERROLE, PATIENTHOSPITALROOM, HOSPITALVISITDATE, UMHSDATA_CSN, UMHSDATA_PROV_ID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @UMHSID, @PROVIDERID, @DEPARTMENTID, @MATCHEDSUBDEPARTMENTID, @CATEGORYMEMBERDESCRIPTION, @LASTPROCDATE, @VISITTYPE, @VISITSTARTDATE, @VISITENDDATE, @PROVIDERROLE, @PATIENTHOSPITALROOM, @HOSPITALVISITDATE, @UMHSDATA_CSN, @UMHSDATA_PROV_ID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE)
commit tran end try begin catch rollback tran exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
